PRO_STA 접수	01
PRO_STA	승인	02
PRO_STA	미승인	03
PRO_STA	취소	04


FN_GET_CODE_NAME('VOL_ACT', VOL_ACT_CODE) VOL_ACT_CODE



SELECT A.PROF_ID
        , (SELECT B.NAME
           FROM CONSULT_SCHEDULE A, MEMBER B
           WHERE A.PROF_ID = B.MEM_ID
           GROUP BY B.NAME
           )NAME
        , C.KOR_NAME DEPARTMENT
		, TO_CHAR(CONSULT_AVL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') CONSULT_AVL_DATE
		, A.START_TIME
		, A.END_TIME 
		, A.CONSULT_SCHDL_NUM
		, A.CAP
		, A.CAP_SEAT
		, A.CREATE_DATE
		, A.MOD_DATE
		FROM CONSULT_SCHEDULE A, PROFESSOR B, UNIVERSITY_DEPARTMENT C
		WHERE B.UNIV_DEPT_NUM = C.UNIV_DEPT_NUM
